## NavigationFailureType enum

Enumeration with all possible types for navigation failures. Can be passed to  to check for specific failures.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum NavigationFailureType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aborted | <code>4</code> | An aborted navigation is a navigation that failed because a navigation guard returned <code>false</code> or called <code>next(false)</code> |
|  cancelled | <code>8</code> | A cancelled navigation is a navigation that failed because a more recent navigation finished started (not necessarily finished). |
|  duplicated | <code>16</code> | A duplicated navigation is a navigation that failed because it was initiated while already being at the exact same location. |
